column4: Is anyone here very familiar with the magic SysRq key commands?
be carefull to not hit other key by accident lol

I was just able to log into a TTY after doing Alt+SysRq+R-S-E, (was about to reboot because dosemu froze the system), and restart KDM from there. Everything looks fine. Is this safe practice, or would I be better off doing the full procedure (RSEIUB) only?
